Detailed Description

Analyzer executes the Chinese morphological analysis.

Analyzer executes the Chinese morphological analysis. Typically, the usage is like below:

// create instances CMA_Factory* factory = CMA_Factory::instance(); Analyzer* analyzer = factory->createAnalyzer(); Knowledge* knowledge = factory->createKnowledge();

// load dictionaries knowledge->loadSystemDict("..."); knowledge->loadUserDict("..."); knowledge->loadStopWordDict("..."); knowledge->loadStatModel("...");

// set knowledge analyzer->setKnowledge(knowledge);

// analyze a sentence Sentence s; s.setString("..."); analyzer->runWithSentence(s); ...

// analyze a paragraph const char* result = analyzer->runWithString("..."); ...

// analyze a file analyzer->runWithStream("...", "...");

delete knowledge; delete analyzer;

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum cma::Analyzer::OptionType

Option type for analysis.

Enumerator:
OPTION_TYPE_POS_TAGGING  the value zero for not to tag part-of-speech tags in the result of runWithSentence(), runWithString() and runWithStream(), which value is 1 defaultly.
OPTION_TYPE_NBEST  a positive value to set the number of candidate results of runWithSentence(), which value is 1 defaultly.
OPTION_TYPE_NUM  the count of option types

const char * cma::Analyzer::getPOSDelimiter (  )  const

Get the delimiter between word and POS tag in the output result of runWithString() and runWithStream(), which delimiter is "/" defaultly so that the result would be "word/pos word/pos ...".

Returns:
the delimiter between word and POS tag in the output result

References posDelimiter_.

const char * cma::Analyzer::getWordDelimiter (  )  const

Get the delimiter between the pairs (word and POS tag) in the output result of runWithString() and runWithStream(), which delimiter is " " (double-space) defaultly so that the result would be "word/pos word/pos ...".

Returns:
the delimiter between the pairs (word and POS tag) in the output result

References wordDelimiter_.

virtual int cma::Analyzer::runWithSentence ( Sentence &  sentence  )  [pure virtual]

Execute the morphological analysis based on a sentence.

Parameters:
sentence the instance containing the raw sentence string and also to save the analysis result
Returns:
0 for fail, 1 for success
Precondition:
the raw sentence string could be got by sentence.getString().
Postcondition:
on successful return, the n-best results could be got by sentence.getListSize(), etc.

Implemented in cma::CMA_ME_Analyzer.

virtual int cma::Analyzer::runWithStream ( const char *  inFileName,
const char *  outFileName 
) [pure virtual]

Execute the morphological analysis based on a file.

Parameters:
inFileName input file name
outFileName output file name
Returns:
0 for fail, 1 for success
Postcondition:
on successful return, the one-best result is printed to file outFileName.

Implemented in cma::CMA_ME_Analyzer.
